arn.description: ARN of the dataset that contains permissions for RLS.

formatVersion.description: User or group rules associated with the dataset that contains permissions for RLS.

namespace.description: Namespace associated with the dataset that contains permissions for RLS.

permissionPolicy.description: Type of permissions to use when interpreting the permissions for RLS. Valid values are `GRANT_ACCESS` and `DENY_ACCESS`.

status.description: Status of the row-level security permission dataset. If enabled, the status is `ENABLED`. If disabled, the status is `DISABLED`.
